Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Photograph \Pho"to*graph\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Photographed}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Photographing}.] To take a picture or likeness of by means of photography; as, to photograph a view; to photograph a group. [1913 Webster]
He makes his pen drawing on white paper, and they are afterwards photographed on wood. --Hamerton. [1913 Webster]
Note: Also used figuratively. [1913 Webster]
He is photographed on my mind. --Lady D. Hardy. [1913 Webster]
